content: crochet daschund bookmark | fonalart crochet dachshund bookmark fonalart about the pattern this pattern is designed and written by dora zolnai copyright of the pattern belongs to dora zolnai fonalart please do not copy share or sell the pattern it is for your personal use only you may sell products you have created from using this pattern please credit dora zolnai fonalart as the designer if you sell the finished items thank you if you have any question about the pattern please feel free to contact by e-mail fonalart@fonalart hu or via facebook www facebook com/fonalart visit my website www fonalart hu pag e 1 | 9 crochet daschund bookmark | fonalart fonalart abbreviations  magic_ring magic_ring  st/sts stitch/stitches skill level  slip_stitch slip_stitch advanced beginner  chain chain  single_crochet single_crochet instructions  half_double_crochet half_double_crochet  increase increase 2 single_crochet in next st american standard terms  decrease decrease join next 2 sts into 1  repeat repeat yarn dk yarn important notes numbers shown in indicate the number of stitches you materials should have at the end of the row/round i ve used alize cotton gold yarn 50% cotton 50% acrilic but it is also nice with other yarns please use dk yarn so the bookmark is crocheted the bookmark will fit be cca 15-16 inches long with single_crochet stitches in spiral rounds and then crocheted in row without sewing do not cut the brown  brown yarn or yarn in the dog s color yarn before finishing  small amount of black yarn for the eyes and nose  small amount of white yarn for the eyes  small amount of yarn for the dog s collar  fiberfill  c/2 or d/3 2 5 - 3 mm crochet hook depends on your yarn  scissors  sewing needle  safety pins pag e 2 | 9 crochet daschund bookmark | fonalart head r1 black 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 sts r2 black *single_crochet 1 increase* repeat 3 times 9 sts r3 black 9 single_crochet 9 sts fasten_off leave a long thread 15 inch you will use it for the eyes r4 brown *single_crochet 2 increase* repeat 3 times 12 sts r5 brown *single_crochet 5 increase* repeat 2 times 14 sts r6 brown *single_crochet 6 increase* repeat 2 times 16 sts r7 brown *single_crochet 7 increase* repeat 2 times 18 sts r8 brown *single_crochet 8 increase* repeat 2 times 20 sts r9 brown *single_crochet 9 increase* repeat 2 times 22 sts r10 brown *single_crochet 10 increase* repeat 2 times 24 sts r11-16 brown 24 single_crochet 24 sts r17 brown *single_crochet 4 decrease* repeat 4 times 20 sts r18 brown *single_crochet 3 decrease* repeat 4 times 16 rts stuff the head tightly y d a e r s i d a e h e h t pag e 3 | 9 crochet daschund bookmark | fonalart neck r19 brown press the opening of the head 7 sts work in row together and crochet the head together with
